hackathon-description-text: This is the Challenge site for the Ho Chi Minh City locus of the dual-city Vietnam Hackathon 2014 organized by Formation 8.  There is a second locus in Hanoi.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Deputy Chief of Department of Int'l Cooperation - MOST

hackathon-eligibility:
Any student, developer or technology enthusiast in Vietnam who can travel to Hanoi or Ho Chi Minh City on the day of the hackathon.
Teams may comprise of no more than 4 members.
hackathon-requirements: Submissions should attempt to follow one of the following themes:
hackathon-rules:
Apply by July 15th on the hackathon website.
Rules and Judging Criteria can be found on the hackathon website here:
http://www.hackathonvietnam.com/details
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=National Institute of Administration, 10 3 Tháng 2, 12th Ward, District 10, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
1) Importance of the problem
2) Applicability  and topic development
3) Large scale application

1) Novelty of idea
2) Novelty of approach
3) Novelty of design

1) Potential for creation to be a startup
2) Can it be immediately implemented
3) Creation meets the application requirements set out?

1) Team effectively presents creation in allotted time
2) Team expressed confidence while presenting
3) Team expressed an effective future strategy

1) Do similar products exist?
2) Is the product intuitive, clear and understandable?

1) Does the product address a current need?
2) Is the product a necessity for the consumer?
3) Can the product improve everyday life for the consumer?

hackathon-location-address: National Institute of Administration, 10 3 Tháng 2, 12th Ward, District 10, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
hackathon-description-header: Hackathon Vietnam @ Ho Chi Minh City:  Top Engineers, Leading Entrepreneurs, Premier Venture Capital
